name: Lode
author: Tomas Buteler <info@lode.run>
description: A universal GUI for unit testing

scripts.migrate:up: cross-env LOGGER=false LODE_MIGRATE=false node workflow/dev-runner.js migrate up
scripts.migrate:down: cross-env LOGGER=false LODE_MIGRATE=false node workflow/dev-runner.js migrate down
scripts.pack:reporters: yarn run pack:jest && yarn run pack:phpunit
scripts.dev: yarn run icons && cross-env IS_DEV=true node workflow/dev-runner.js
scripts.clean:all: yarn run clean:build && yarn run clean
scripts.build:before: yarn run clean:all && yarn run icons && yarn run pack:reporters && yarn run licenses
scripts.build: yarn run build:before && node workflow/build.js && cross-env NOTARIZE=false electron-builder && yarn run build:after
scripts.build:unix: yarn run build:before && node workflow/build.js && cross-env NOTARIZE=false electron-builder --m --l && yarn run build:after
scripts.build:linux: yarn run build:before && node workflow/build.js && cross-env NOTARIZE=false electron-builder --l && yarn run build:after
scripts.release: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --publish always && yarn run release:after
scripts.release:mac: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --m --publish always && yarn run release:after
scripts.release:linux: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --l --publish always && yarn run release:after
scripts.release:win: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --w --publish always && yarn run release:after
scripts.release:unix: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --m --l --publish always && yarn run release:after
scripts.release:all: yarn run release:before && node workflow/build.js && electron-builder --m --l --w --publish always && yarn run release:after
